title: Hotfix for map icons showing up in routes they don't belong to

changes.change: Deleting a pull will now once again properly re-arrange the indices of your remaining pulls and not leave you with gaps or unordered pulls.
Color selection in your profile no longer has a messed up layout since the addition of the Evoker class (class colors are liinked there).
Newly registered users no longer have an unknown locale selected.
Adding new map icons to any route no longer has them showing up in other routes.
